text:
This text describes the Australian miniseries titled "Faraway Downs," which is a reedit by director Baz Luhrmann of his 2008 film "Australia." The six episodes were released on November 26, 2023, and feature new endings along with modernized music. The text also offers multiple download options including magnet links for torrenting and direct links to cloud storage platforms like Aliyun Drive, Quark, and UCNet.

Additionally, it promotes following the WeChat public account "影的后花园" or ID "BluFilm" for more movie-related content.
